rules_text:
Whenever Thundering Captain attacks, create a tapped and attacking 2/3 red Minotaur Warrior creature token.
[i]Skullkeeping[/i] – {3}{R}{W}, Exile Thundering Captain from your graveyard: Create two 2/3 red Minotaur Warrior creature tokens. Activate this ability if you own two or more cards in exile with a skull counter on it.
